content:
Microsoft.VisualBasic.MyServices Namespace

Definition

The Microsoft.VisualBasic.MyServices namespace contains types that support My in Visual Basic.

In this Article

Introduction

For more information about My in Visual Basic, see Development with My.

Classes

ClipboardProxy

Provides methods for manipulating the Clipboard.
FileSystemProxy

Provides properties and methods for working with drives, files, and directories.
RegistryProxy

Provides properties and methods for manipulating the registry.
SpecialDirectoriesProxy

Provides properties for accessing commonly referenced directories.
